name: Standby Say You!
overview: Standby Say You is an adventure game about voice acting a videogame. In this game the player controls a voice acting studio director that have to complete the voice acting of a new videogame. He have to talk to the actors and start recording the voices in the game sequences. The gameplay is about talking with the different characters to advance in the game and in the recording and then select the lines that they have to record. The game features real people video sequences and anime sequences too.
